Pedro's Web Page

German Shepherd Dog / Husky / Mixed (medium coat)  : :  Male  : :  Adult  : :  Large

Print an adoption flyer for Pedro!

About Pedro
  • Status: Available for Adoption (adoption info)
  • Species: Dog
  • General Color: Black with Tan, Yellow or Fawn
  • Current Age: 6 Years 5 Months (best estimate)
  • Fence Required: Yes(6 foot)
  • Housetrained: Yes
  • Exercise Needs: High
  • Reaction to New People: Friendly

PLEASE READ FULL DESCRIPTION BEFORE EMAILING OR CALLING WITH QUESTIONS ABOUT THIS PET He loves to play, sleep and absolutely loves kids. Pedro and my dog Mrs. Addington get along great. He likes his chew toys and enjoys being in his crate. Adoption Fee includes spay/neuter, current vaccinations, and microchip. If interested in this pet please email rescueadogtoday@gmail.com for an application or visit one of our weekly adoption clinics! SPAY/NEUTER IS REQUIRED AND NON-NEGOTIABLE. PLEASE DO NOT REQUEST WE MAKE AN EXCEPTION FOR YOU AS IT IS NOT SOMETHING WE WILL BUDGE ON!

More about Pedro

Good with Dogs, Good with Kids, Good with Adults, Does Good in the Car, Requires a yard, Cratetrained, Likes to play with toys, Playful
